short_summary: A request for proposal for the supply of at least one (1) Instrument Flight Rules (IFR) controller or Visual Flight Rule (VFR) controller to support flight operations in Canadian Forces Base Bagotoville, Quebec.
description: all required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on May 16th  2023. All bids submitted after 2 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non responsive.
